titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relative to expenditures to affect Congressional, Presidential, State, and local elections.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

bill.summary: 7/25/1996--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Grants authority to the: (1) Congress to set limits on expenditures in any election for Federal office; and (2) States to set limits on expenditures in any election for State and local office.
